name: kis-blocks
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.release: npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p releases && zip -r releases/kis-blocks-v$npm_package_version.zip kis-blocks -x "kis-blocks/node_modules/*" "kis-blocks/.git/*" "kis-blocks/*.zip" "kis-blocks/.DS_Store" "kis-blocks/**/.DS_Store"
scripts.verify:zip: unzip -l ../releases/kis-blocks-v$npm_package_version.zip | awk '{print $4}' | grep -qx 'kis-blocks/kis-blocks.php' || (echo 'ZIP missing kis-blocks/kis-blocks.php (root folder required)' && exit 1)
scripts.verify:zip:structure: unzip -l ../releases/kis-blocks-v$npm_package_version.zip | awk '{print $4}' | grep -qx 'kis-blocks.php' && (echo 'ZIP has root-level kis-blocks.php (root folder required)' && exit 1) || true
